Rational Team Concert

  1. Here's what I used and why. MS Project : I was young and foolish. MS Excel : It's like duct-tape for corporate life…light-weight, strong, and flexible. VersionOne : It was a nice Agile tool and the company I worked at (Intel) had licenses for it. RTC [Rational Team Concert] : Someone at my corporation had recently purchased licenses for it… (LinkedIn3)
  2. We use Rational Team Concert (RTC) that is an integrated tool with templates, collaborative features reports, dashboards and a lot of others stuffs.
